query.text: ----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: rdf_has(Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), subtask_all(Task, SubtaskPerceive), rdf_has(SubtaskPerceive, rdf:type, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(Task, knowrob:'startTime', T), add_agent_visualization('PR2', pr2:'PR2Robot1', T, '', '').
query.text: What was the pose of the robot during perception actions?

query.q: findall(_Task, rdf_has(_Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), _L), length(_L, Count).
query.text: Count instances of object finding tasks

query.q: rdf_has(Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), not((subtask_all(Task, _SubtaskPerceive), rdf_has(_SubtaskPerceive, rdf:type, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), once(owl_has(_SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionResult', _Obj)))).
query.text: Object finding tasks that failed due to no object being found

query.q: rdf_has(Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), subtask_all(Task, _SubtaskPerceive), rdf_has(_SubtaskPerceive, rdf:type, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), once(owl_has(_SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj)).

rdf_has(Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), subtask_all(Task, SubtaskPerceive), rdf_has(SubtaskPerceive, rdf:type, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), once(owl_has(SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj)), owl_has(SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionRequest', RequestDesig), mng_designator_props(RequestDesig, 'TYPE', 'PANCAKEMIX').
query.text: Trying to find the pancake mix and succeeding

query.q: rdf_has(Task, rdf:type, knowrob:'FindingObjects'), subtask_all(Task, SubtaskPerceive), rdf_has(SubtaskPerceive, rdf:type, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), not(once(owl_has(SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj))), owl_has(SubtaskPerceive, knowrob:'perceptionRequest', RequestDesig), mng_designator_props(RequestDesig, 'TYPE', 'COFFEE').
query.text: Trying to find the coffee and failing

query.q:
findall(Type-Num, (owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'CRAMFailure'),
 rdf_split_url(_, Type, T),findall(F, failure_type(F, T), Failures),
 length(Failures, Num)), Distrib),pairs_keys_values(Distrib, Types, Nums),
 add_diagram(errordist, 'Error distribution', piechart, xlabel, ylabel, 350, 350, '11px', [[Types, Nums]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in the chart
